dcterms:description: IndicVoices is an ASR dataset comprising 7348 hours of natural, spontaneous speech from 16237 speakers across 22 Indian languages, featuring monolingual and code-switched speech.
dcterms:title: IndicVoices

dcterms:description: IndicTrans2 is a machine translation model aimed at providing high-quality and accessible translations for all 22 scheduled Indian languages.
dcterms:title: IndicTrans2

dcterms:description: A set of evaluation benchmarks for code-switched speech translation in Bengali-English, Hindi-English, Marathi-English, and Telugu-English.
dcterms:title: Code-switched Evaluation Sets

dcterms:description: Evaluation sets derived from podcasts featuring complex code-switching in Hindi-English and Telugu-English.
dcterms:title: Podcast Evaluation Sets

dcterms:description: Monolingual evaluation sets for Telugu and Hindi, created to evaluate performance on largely monolingual inputs.
dcterms:title: Monolingual Evaluation Sets
